div.span: Value Living Welcome to eaves Huntington Beach, located in Orange County – where sensible apartment living meets a sensible cost of living. We offer quality one- and two-bedroom Huntington Beach apartments with a few little extras you’ll value, like well-equipped kitchens with brand name appliances and in-unit washers and dryers. And with a location just five miles from the Huntington Beach Pier, you’ll look forward to coming home each and every day. Simply put, our Huntington Beach apartments for rent offer more of what you hope for. Better than you bargained for. So what are you waiting for? Huntington Beach Apartments by eaves You deserve an apartment where you can live comfortably no matter where you call home. At eaves Huntington Beach, that’s exactly what you’ll get. Just steps from your front door are all of the necessities you need for daily living, including stores like Stater Brothers, Big Lots and CVS, as well as indoor and outdoor entertainment options such as Charter Centre Cinemas and Golden View Park. Navigating the area will be a breeze due to our convenient access to the Orange County Transportation Authority bus service, Pacific Coast Highway, the I-405 and more. About Huntington Beach, CA Becoming part of our Orange County apartment community will grant you many perks designed for a lifestyle of comfort, convenience and peace of mind. Would you like to be able to get in a good workout but don’t have the time or money to be a regular at the gym? Make use of our fitness center and sparkling swimming pool, both included at no extra cost. Have you had trouble getting maintenance issues fixed in previous residences? We’ll take care of any issues that arise – quickly – allowing you to focus on the important parts of your life. Contact us to schedule an appointment and learn more about your new apartment in Huntington Beach today.

div.h2: this is the real deal. this is eaves.

a.div: Understanding what you value goes beyond offering you a quality apartment. It means having a respectful, friendly staff that you know you can depend on when you need them. Giving you one less thing to worry about and one more way to feel at home in your new community. That’s eaves.
We know you value convenience. That’s why all of our locations are also carefully selected to put you within reach of local shopping, restaurants and public transportation.

You made a promise to yourself to live within your means. That doesn't mean living without. Take advantage of our special resident discounts, early deposit refund program, and longer lease term options.

div.div: Room dimensions, square footage, and features shown on the floor plan drawings are approximate and may vary between individual apartments that have similar layouts. Furniture shown on the floor plan drawings is representative and individual apartments come unfurnished unless specified otherwise. Quoted rent is per month for new move-ins to the community, based on the move-in date selected. Pricing may vary based on lease term. Quoted rent does not including other fees and charges that may be part of your lease (i.e. utilities, parking, etc.). Please contact the community for details. Prior to signing a lease, quoted rent, specials, availability, and other terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. Washington State - We require our own screening and do not accept comprehensive reusable tenant screening reports.

div.p: Curious about the community layout? You can download the community site map here.

better than you expected.","description":"Value Living Welcome to eaves Huntington Beach, located in Orange County – where sensible apartment living meets a sensible cost of living. We offer quality one- and two-bedroom Huntington Beach apartments with a few little extras you’ll value, like well-equipped kitchens with brand name appliances and in-unit washers and dryers. And with a location just five miles from the Huntington Beach Pier, you’ll look forward to coming home each and every day. Simply put, our Huntington Beach apartments for rent offer more of what you hope for. Better than you bargained for. So what are you waiting for? Huntington Beach Apartments by eaves You deserve an apartment where you can live comfortably no matter where you call home. At eaves Huntington Beach, that’s exactly what you’ll get. Just steps from your front door are all of the necessities you need for daily living, including stores like Stater Brothers, Big Lots and CVS, as well as indoor and outdoor entertainment options such as Charter Centre Cinemas and Golden View Park. Navigating the area will be a breeze due to our convenient access to the Orange County Transportation Authority bus service, Pacific Coast Highway, the I-405 and more. About Huntington Beach, CA Becoming part of our Orange County apartment community will grant you many perks designed for a lifestyle of comfort, convenience and peace of mind. Would you like to be able to get in a good workout but don’t have the time or money to be a regular at the gym? Make use of our fitness center and sparkling swimming pool, both included at no extra cost. Have you had trouble getting maintenance issues fixed in previous residences? We’ll take care of any issues that arise – quickly – allowing you to focus on the important parts of your life.
